title: Work No. 25
provenance_text:
Shin Kuno [1921-1998], Nagoya, Japan; Muramatsu Gallery, Tokyo, Japan [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 209, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Muramatsu Gallery.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International.
